posts.post_title: T206 John McGraw & T206 Jimmy Collins For Sale.
posts.post_content:
I have a T206 John McGraw (finger), a T206 Jimmy Collins, and two T206 PSA 1 commons (Adkins and Rhoades) for sale. Price includes shipping (paypal, check, mo, all work for me).  My email address is [url]agonzdude@yahoo.com[/url]. Thanks for looking!
